name: Ludo Classic - Made with Godot
description:
Ludo is a multiplayer indoor board game for two to four players.  It is very easy to play and a good way to spend time with friends and family.

I have made this game using Godot game engine and have published under my game brand "NutGames".

Download link: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.shahediqbal.ludo

Website:  https://nutgames.net/
